docna.cdata!:
Sudan - Agricultural Services Project :
            Credit 1201 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Sudan - Agricultural Services
            Project : Credit 1201 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Sudan - Agricultural Services Project :
            Credit 1201 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Sudan - Agricultural Services
            Project : Credit 1201 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would provide: (i)
            technical assistance and training; (ii) additional ABS
            buildings for offices, stores and staff housing to increase
            efficiency and to facilitate supply distribution and
            marketing; (iii) vehicles for ABS headquarters and branch
            offices to enable timely services to farmers; and (iv)
            incremental ABS operating costs such as salaries, vehicle
            expenses, and building maintenance. The project would
            further provide as appropriate: (v) pumpsets and spare parts
            to ensure adequate water supply to crops in Abu Hamed and
            Dongola areas and tubewells in the Dongola area; (vi)
            agricultural machinery, and trucks in the selected
            subproject areas; and (vii) incremental annual farm inputs,
            cash advances, and other farm operational costs in the
            subproject areas.
